definitions.definition: Characterized by thuggery ; behaving in a violent or intimidating way; appearing to be violent or intimidating.
examples: Their thuggish manner made continuing negotiations very difficult.

definitions.definition: Resembling or characteristic of the assassins known as thugs or thuggees (often capitalized in this sense).

main_definition: ( derogatory ) Characterized by thuggery ; behaving in a violent or intimidating way; appearing to be violent or intimidating.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) Resembling or characteristic of the assassins known as thugs or thuggees (often capitalized in this sense).
